Name: NARK THE DRAGON
About the game: This game is a puzzle in which you have to feed the dragon from the catapult. You will have to comprehensively calculate the path to the ancient being, bypassing obstacles, and using auxiliary objects to achieve the goal. A nice picture, day and night locations, thirty different levels, will please fans of this genre. - This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5.
